09fc532228732d6a182abf13cb1808f9c37f0107.query:
WITH RECURSIVE
                    base_task AS (
                        SELECT
                            t.id,
                            t.title,
                            t.completed_at,
                            t.start_date,
                            t.end_date,
                            t.estimate,
                            u.id as responsible_id,
                            u.name as responsible_name,
                            u.picture_url as responsible_picture_url,
                            g.id as group_id,
                            g.title as group_title,
                            g.uid as group_uid,
                            r.id as recurrence_id,
                            r.frequency as recurrence_frequency,
                            r.is_every as recurrence_is_every,
                            r.current_task_id as recurrence_current_task_id,
                            c.previous_task_id as recurrence_previous_task_id
                        FROM
                            tasks t
                        INNER JOIN
                            users u ON
                                u.id = t.responsible_user_id
                        LEFT JOIN
                            groups g ON
                                g.id = t.group_id
                        LEFT JOIN
                            recurrences r ON
                                r.id = t.recurrence_id
                        LEFT JOIN
                            tasks c ON
                                c.id = r.current_task_id
                        WHERE
                            t.id = $1
                    ),
                    every_task AS (
                        SELECT
                            bt.*,
                            0 depth
                        FROM
                            base_task bt
                        WHERE
                            bt.recurrence_is_every
                        UNION ALL
                        SELECT
                            et.id,
                            et.title,
                            et.completed_at,
                            (et.start_date + et.recurrence_frequency)::date,
                            (et.end_date + et.recurrence_frequency)::date,
                            et.estimate,
                            et.responsible_id,
                            et.responsible_name,
                            et.responsible_picture_url,
                            et.group_id,
                            et.group_title,
                            et.group_uid,
                            et.recurrence_id,
                            et.recurrence_frequency,
                            et.recurrence_is_every,
                            et.recurrence_current_task_id,
                            et.recurrence_previous_task_id,
                            et.depth + 1
                        FROM
                            every_task et
                        WHERE
                            et.depth < $2 AND
                            COALESCE(et.start_date, et.end_date) + et.recurrence_frequency < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
                    )
                SELECT
                    bt.id,
                    bt.title,
                    bt.completed_at,
                    bt.start_date,
                    bt.end_date,
                    bt.estimate,
                    bt.responsible_id,
                    bt.responsible_name,
                    bt.responsible_picture_url,
                    bt.group_id as "group_id: Option<i32>",
                    bt.group_title as "group_title: Option<String>",
                    bt.group_uid as "group_uid: Option<Uuid>",
                    bt.recurrence_id as "recurrence_id: Option<i32>",
                    bt.recurrence_frequency as "recurrence_frequency: Option<PgInterval>",
                    bt.recurrence_is_every as "recurrence_is_every: Option<bool>",
                    bt.recurrence_current_task_id as "recurrence_current_task_id: Option<i32>",
                    bt.recurrence_previous_task_id,
                    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM every_task et WHERE et.id = bt.id AND et.start_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)::int as recurrence_num_ready_to_start,
                    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM every_task et WHERE et.id = bt.id AND et.end_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)::int as recurrence_num_reached_deadline
                FROM
                    base_task bt

0d2d3db1a852fc49a0334ad071c79524a3ab0434.query:
SELECT
                        -- Viewer in group
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                users_groups
                            WHERE
                                user_id = $1 AND
                                group_id = $3
                        ) AND
                        -- Responsible in group
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                users_groups
                            WHERE
                                user_id = $2 AND
                                group_id = $3
                        )

12fc47eaed77983b8e993e5be858d0bf84604540.query:
UPDATE
                    tasks t
                SET
                    title = $3,
                    start_date = $4,
                    end_date = $5,
                    responsible_user_id = $6,
                    group_id = $7,
                    estimate = $8
                WHERE
                    t.id = $2 AND
                    -- Permission check
                    (
                        -- Viewer is responsible
                        t.responsible_user_id = $1 OR
                        -- Viewer is in task group
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                users_groups ug
                            WHERE
                                ug.group_id = t.group_id AND
                                ug.user_id = $1
                        )
                    )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: TaskId"

14fd4db15ffa6910b8d4f3a085902a2194222e8d.query:
SELECT
                    g.id as "id: GroupId",
                    g.title,
                    g.uid
                FROM
                    groups g
                INNER JOIN
                    users_groups ug ON
                        ug.group_id = g.id
                WHERE
                    ug.user_id = $1

1e59d0bc0b19919938c42f0ddc1f24e1411a9546.query:
INSERT INTO tasks (
                    responsible_user_id,
                    title,
                    start_date,
                    end_date,
                    group_id,
                    estimate
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1,
                    $2,
                    $3,
                    $4,
                    $5,
                    $6
                )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: TaskId"

29a2e90c1d7e246ccfc4bf02af698eb19ee28950.query:
WITH
                    rec AS (
                        INSERT INTO recurrences (
                            frequency,
                            is_every,
                            current_task_id
                        )
                        VALUES (
                            $1,
                            $2,
                            $3
                        )
                        RETURNING
                            id
                    )
                UPDATE
                    tasks t
                SET
                    recurrence_id = r.id
                FROM
                    rec r
                WHERE
                    t.id = $3

33fb99aa9fd2ae03664e2ab838df099e673912f6.query:
UPDATE
                    tasks t
                SET
                    group_id = NULL
                WHERE
                    t.responsible_user_id = $1 AND
                    t.group_id = $2

3ca8e3b2b68c196f66ab3faa7be66eb48a81a95b.query:
UPDATE
                    tasks t
                SET
                    completed_at = CASE
                        WHEN $3 THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC'
                        ELSE NULL
                    END
                WHERE
                    t.id = $2 AND
                    -- Permission check
                    (
                        -- Viewer is responsible
                        t.responsible_user_id = $1 OR
                        -- Viewer is in task group
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                users_groups ug
                            WHERE
                                ug.group_id = t.group_id AND
                                ug.user_id = $1
                        )
                    )
                RETURNING
                    completed_at

3ee3b2e61ebcd26cb17cbb8aa4ed13ae25a5e344.query:
DELETE FROM
                    recurrences r
                WHERE
                    r.id = $1

4ebe4f8512bab12d12bef9622cb8a2abd1dcb7d4.query:
DELETE FROM
                    groups g
                WHERE
                    id = $1 AND
                    NOT EXISTS (
                        SELECT
                        FROM
                            users_groups ug
                        WHERE
                            ug.group_id = g.id
                    )

5207d2887c50a44bf6d0b6b5c0a326dd595b1de1.query:
UPDATE
                    recurrences r
                SET
                    current_task_id = $1
                WHERE
                    r.current_task_id = $2

6ce4ba473682291f826b9ce5d2294132014c9b79.query:
INSERT INTO users (
                    uid,
                    name,
                    picture_url
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1,
                    $2,
                    $3
                )
                ON CONFLICT (uid) DO UPDATE SET
                    name = EXCLUDED.name,
                    picture_url = EXCLUDED.picture_url
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: UserId",
                    uid,
                    name,
                    picture_url

75b91b71d0393dffce807e6ccd0bd40de85b88ad.query:
SELECT
                    u.id as "id: UserId",
                    u.uid,
                    u.name,
                    u.picture_url
                FROM
                    users u
                INNER JOIN
                    users_groups ug ON
                        ug.user_id = u.id
                WHERE
                    ug.group_id = $2 AND
                    EXISTS (
                        SELECT
                        FROM
                            users_groups viewer_groups
                        WHERE
                            viewer_groups.user_id = $1 AND
                            viewer_groups.group_id = $2
                    )

792c754e379cb5de080a08b3fd0036ba44e3c372.query:
UPDATE
                    recurrences r
                SET
                    frequency = $1,
                    is_every = $2
                WHERE
                    r.id = $3

8935531f6a26a8e467f0a1c483cce1aeb7f56066.query:
WITH RECURSIVE
                    base_tasks AS (
                        SELECT
                            t.id,
                            t.title,
                            t.completed_at,
                            t.start_date,
                            t.end_date,
                            t.estimate,
                            u.id as responsible_id,
                            u.name as responsible_name,
                            u.picture_url as responsible_picture_url,
                            g.id as group_id,
                            g.title as group_title,
                            g.uid as group_uid,
                            r.id as recurrence_id,
                            r.frequency as recurrence_frequency,
                            r.is_every as recurrence_is_every,
                            r.current_task_id as recurrence_current_task_id,
                            c.previous_task_id as recurrence_previous_task_id
                        FROM
                            tasks t
                        INNER JOIN
                            users u ON
                                u.id = t.responsible_user_id
                        LEFT JOIN
                            groups g ON
                                g.id = t.group_id
                        LEFT JOIN
                            recurrences r ON
                                r.id = t.recurrence_id
                        LEFT JOIN
                            tasks c ON
                                c.id = r.current_task_id
                        WHERE
                            -- Hide old items
                            (
                                t.completed_at IS NULL OR
                                t.completed_at > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 day'
                            ) AND
                            -- Permission check
                            (
                                -- Viewer is responsible
                                t.responsible_user_id = $1 OR
                                -- Viewer is in task group
                                EXISTS (
                                    SELECT
                                    FROM
                                        users_groups ug
                                    WHERE
                                        ug.group_id = t.group_id AND
                                        ug.user_id = $1
                                )
                            )
                    ),
                    every_tasks AS (
                        SELECT
                            bt.*,
                            0 depth
                        FROM
                            base_tasks bt
                        WHERE
                            bt.recurrence_is_every
                        UNION ALL
                        SELECT
                            et.id,
                            et.title,
                            et.completed_at,
                            (et.start_date + et.recurrence_frequency)::date,
                            (et.end_date + et.recurrence_frequency)::date,
                            et.estimate,
                            et.responsible_id,
                            et.responsible_name,
                            et.responsible_picture_url,
                            et.group_id,
                            et.group_title,
                            et.group_uid,
                            et.recurrence_id,
                            et.recurrence_frequency,
                            et.recurrence_is_every,
                            et.recurrence_current_task_id,
                            et.recurrence_previous_task_id,
                            et.depth + 1
                        FROM
                            every_tasks et
                        WHERE
                            et.depth < $2 AND
                            COALESCE(et.start_date, et.end_date) + et.recurrence_frequency < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
                    )
                SELECT
                    bt.id,
                    bt.title,
                    bt.completed_at,
                    bt.start_date,
                    bt.end_date,
                    bt.estimate,
                    bt.responsible_id,
                    bt.responsible_name,
                    bt.responsible_picture_url,
                    bt.group_id as "group_id: Option<i32>",
                    bt.group_title as "group_title: Option<String>",
                    bt.group_uid as "group_uid: Option<Uuid>",
                    bt.recurrence_id as "recurrence_id: Option<i32>",
                    bt.recurrence_frequency as "recurrence_frequency: Option<PgInterval>",
                    bt.recurrence_is_every as "recurrence_is_every: Option<bool>",
                    bt.recurrence_current_task_id as "recurrence_current_task_id: Option<i32>",
                    bt.recurrence_previous_task_id,
                    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM every_tasks et WHERE et.id = bt.id AND et.start_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)::int as recurrence_num_ready_to_start,
                    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM every_tasks et WHERE et.id = bt.id AND et.end_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)::int as recurrence_num_reached_deadline
                FROM
                    base_tasks bt

89634b2042189f891057f5fd5072eb4d6ca3067e.query:
DELETE FROM
                    tasks t
                WHERE
                    t.id = $2 AND
                    -- Permission check
                    (
                        -- Viewer is responsible
                        t.responsible_user_id = $1 OR
                        -- Viewer is in task group
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                users_groups ug
                            WHERE
                                ug.group_id = t.group_id AND
                                ug.user_id = $1
                        )
                    )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: TaskId"

959dd1255da06b62f8350e2c1735f617ab83305f.query:
INSERT INTO groups (
                    title
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1
                )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: GroupId",
                    title,
                    uid

99cb7feb76b5395b61af9edbffc05c5abd6bacb7.query:
WITH
                    new_task AS (
                        INSERT INTO tasks (
                            responsible_user_id,
                            title,
                            start_date,
                            end_date,
                            group_id,
                            estimate,
                            previous_task_id,
                            recurrence_id
                        )
                        SELECT
                            t.responsible_user_id,
                            t.title,
                            t.start_date + CASE
                                WHEN r.is_every THEN
                                    r.frequency
                                ELSE
                                    r.frequency +
                                    (
                                        CURRENT_DATE -
                                        COALESCE(t.start_date, t.end_date)
                                    ) * INTERVAL '1 day'
                            END,
                            t.end_date + CASE
                                WHEN r.is_every THEN
                                    r.frequency
                                ELSE
                                    r.frequency +
                                    (
                                        CURRENT_DATE -
                                        COALESCE(t.start_date, t.end_date)
                                    ) * INTERVAL '1 day'
                            END,
                            t.group_id,
                            t.estimate,
                            t.id,
                            r.id
                        FROM
                            tasks t
                        INNER JOIN
                            recurrences r ON
                                r.id = t.recurrence_id
                        WHERE
                            t.id = $1
                        RETURNING
                            id,
                            recurrence_id
                    )
                UPDATE
                    recurrences r
                SET
                    current_task_id = t.id
                FROM
                    new_task t
                WHERE
                    t.recurrence_id = r.id
                RETURNING
                    t.id as "id: TaskId"

9c00bfa9e6f1fdd9e047dbb751bc96e1d1576d89.query:
UPDATE
                    tasks t
                SET
                    previous_task_id = NULL,
                    recurrence_id = NULL
                WHERE
                    t.recurrence_id = $1

9f4f3758dc89a08a53045521025882b21400c4e8.query:
UPDATE
                    groups g
                SET
                    title = $3
                WHERE
                    g.id = $2 AND
                    EXISTS (
                        SELECT
                        FROM
                            users_groups ug
                        WHERE
                            ug.group_id = g.id AND
                            ug.user_id = $1
                    )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: GroupId",
                    title,
                    uid

b5ed7df19e5ede92f355694fa31c4e8705912b79.query:
SELECT
                    id as "id: GroupId",
                    title,
                    uid
                FROM
                    groups
                WHERE
                    uid = $1

c42b3fe3bb44ec88e797bcba34bd09e399ee1feb.query:
DELETE FROM
                    users_groups ug
                WHERE
                    ug.user_id = $1 AND
                    ug.group_id = $2

c69f2e7d3374e4881e9f0b7d13351e8646b318f1.query:
INSERT INTO users_groups (
                    user_id,
                    group_id
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1,
                    $2
                )

fb96380621e3048061609e3559381bbd403769f8.query:
INSERT INTO users (
                    uid,
                    name
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1,
                    '?'
                )
                ON CONFLICT (uid) DO UPDATE SET
                    -- No-op to allow RETURNING
                    uid = EXCLUDED.uid
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: UserId"
